mapper.sql: company_id, platform_name, website_url, funding_business_type, success_number, funded_amout, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date
mapper.select: select c.company_id companyId,cfc.platform_name platformName, cfc.website_url websiteUrl,cfc.funding_business_type fundingBusinessType, IFNULL(cfc.success_number,0) successNumber, IFNULL(cfc.funded_amout,0) fundedAmout, cfc.create_by createBy,cfc.create_date createDate, cfc.update_by updateBy,cfc.update_date updateDate, a.name areaName,c.name companyName,cfc.operation_address address from crowd_funding_company cfc left join company c on cfc.company_id = c.company_id left join area a on a.area_id=c.area_id

select * from ( (select CONCAT(a.platform_name,'-',c.`name`) name from crowd_funding_company a LEFT JOIN company c on c.company_id=a.company_id where a.platform_name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') LIMIT 5) union (select CONCAT(IFNULL(a.platform_name,''),'-',c.`name`) name from company c LEFT JOIN crowd_funding_company a on c.company_id=a.company_id where c.company_type = 6 and c.`name` like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') LIMIT 5)
) un limit 5

select company_name AS companyName, platform_name AS platformName, website_url AS websiteUrl, funding_business_type AS fundingBusinessTypeCN, success_number AS successNumber, funded_amout AS fundedAmout, operation_address AS address, registration_address AS areaName from crowd_funding_company_dataland where create_date=(SELECT MAX(create_date) from crowd_funding_company_dataland)
